Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, but we believe it could be even more transformative in your hands. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or would like to discuss the details further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this product to life in your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
